channel.title: Joint Operations
channel.description:
Now, I just got the full version of this game yesterday from 1 of my dad's friends and I started playing it for the latter part of yesterday and some part of today. The game is called Joint Operations: Typhoon Rising and I have to say I really enjoyed it. The game is:
Set in the near future during a war between "Joint Operations" forces, which consist of elite special operations soldiers from the US, UK, Germany, France, Russia, Australia and Indonesia who fight against the Free Aceh Movement-like separatist "Rebels" on the islands of Indonesia.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JOTR As it says on Wiki, it is basically focused on the online multiplayer mode but there are a few other modes such as training and that's about it basically plus there are 4 different game types on the online mode. So anyone else played this game? How are your experiences?

item.title: Joint Operations
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

I do recommend it.

Read full topic

item.title: Joint Operations
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Similar to Battlefield Vietnam in the game's look, setting, and feel
Ooh, I love Battlefield Vietnam [as the NVA/Vietcong of course ;)], I might try this later.

Read full topic
